meta.description: Lufthansa Senator Lounge at Washington Dulles International Airport (IAD), Concourse B. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Lufthansa Senator Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Near the Lufthansa Departure Gates B49-B51.

lounge.description: Offering a wide variety of premium snacks and drinks, the Lufthansa Senator Lounges are sure to provide a welcoming atmosphere you seek prior to your flight.

general: Guests can access showers in Business Lounge.
warning: This location does not accept passengers in airline uniforms.

reviews.content: As of Sept 2022, open for business...
First time after reopening, at 4:30 pm. Only a few people here. A little packaged food. No bar. TK looked better. UC in C looked better.
Fantastic staff! They had duck on Christmas day so I felt like at home in Germany. Not crowded at all in the afternoon. If you have Star Gold, that’s the right lounge for you.
Better than nothing. Went at 11am on a Saturday and there wasn’t much food to chose from. Plenty of open seats.
Very crowded in the early evening but best food. Really cooked pieces of meat/fish, vegetables and little sandwiches etc.
Fantastic. Had Indian food for the month of January. Food choices outstanding as always at Senator Lounge.
Love this lounge. Great food, drinks and view. What more could you ask for?
This lounge, without a doubt, exceeds the quality of any United lounge at IAD currently. If you can take the detour you'll be much happier. It won't knock your socks off though.
Nice beverage selection, great food selection (hot and cold), and friendly staff. It gets VERY busy at 4:30, standing room only!
Soooooo much nicer than any of the UA clubs (except the GFL).
Very nice lounge. Very roomy. Well worth to take the buggy and go here instead of the UA lounges.

Best Star Alliance Lounge in IAD, better than Priority Pass options. Trouble is it's crowded/small. If you get a seat, it's comfortable. Service sometimes lags in cleaning, but is pleasant. Lousy wifi.
Totally crowded at 4,30pm. I assume this is the rush hour. Most critically, it was almost a sauna with minimal aircon working. It was so hot we left after 10 mins. A wide range of snacks and drinks.
This is in my experience the best lounge in the U.S., if rated for food and beverage. Minimalist interior, quite German, but great service and board.

Really agree with the reviews on this lounge! The Senator lounge is an isle of real quality in a sea of mediocrity at IAD. Staff is great, some good tasty food, great wifi and nice view of the planes.
The lounge is small. What was really disappointing was the food selection. Worse than United.
Becomes crowded, but good view and good and varied hot and cold food selections: sandwiches, 4 hot dishes, desserts, fruit & veggies.
Great alternative to United's lounges for Star Alliance Gold members. Top shelf drinks, great selection of food and airy and clean space. Wasn't at all crowded when I was there.
Staff and food were great. It was the light snack we were looking for prior to our delayed flight. I shall try to detour here over the US carrier lounges any time.
Busy time, nice CA wines, I felt at home. Excellent food, preparation for a long flight overseas.
One of the best lounges in IAD - may be even the best. Food is excellent! A lot of space, not too many people. And - what is most important - the boarding will be thru the gate.
Great food options, nice space, and many choices of beverages. An outstanding place to relax between flights.
Great lounge compared to the United choices. 3 different cold sandwiches, chicken wings and a pasta when I first stopped in switched out with meatloaf, risotto, and 2 other options. Quality drinks!
Quiet and comfortable. Food selection is great and service is wonderful. A bit small, but it was never too crowded when I was there.
This is a nice lounge that can get very busy. Real food and premium booze are offered too. Also, Heidsieck & Co. monopole champagne is available if you ask for it.
Fantastic food offerings. Real food, not just snacks. Beer offerings were somewhat limited on my visit and wifi was not connectable. Would have given a perfect score if not for the wifi issues.
This is a great lounge with nice seating. The food is decent, and they have dark German beer on tap. I would recommend the little German brotchen (pretzel roll) sandwiches.
This is an excellent, international quality lounge. The food is delicious, fresh, and hot. The drink selection is good. Also, the space is beautiful.
This is a great lounge for food and for relaxing before a flight.
Great lounge: delicious (and plentiful) food options, comfortable lounge chairs, tables for eating/working, luxurious bathrooms, and complimentary alcohol.
This is a bright lounge that has nice decor and tall ceilings. In addition, it offers a selection of good food and beverages.

location.terminalDirections: After security, near the Air France boarding area, close to Gate 22.

otherLounges.name: Etihad Airways Lounge (Chase Sapphire Lounge by The Club)

location.terminalDirections: Located between Concourses A and B, in front of Gate A32 and the main Duty Free Store.
Concourse B, at the top of the escalators after arriving from AeroTrain

otherLounges.name: British Airways The Concorde Dining Room

location.terminalDirections: Near the Lufthansa Departure Gates B49-B51.
After Security, take the shuttle bus or train to Concourse C. Location is near Gate C14.
On the Arrivals (Baggage Claim) Level, across from Baggage Claim #11 and #12.
Located just past the main security checkpoint.
